content:
The Oklahoma State Capitol complex was closed early Monday due to water main breaks that occurred Sunday PERIOD

 said John Richard director of the Department of Central Services in a statement to the media PERIOD 

Employees returned to work Tuesday after a break in the water line was repaired PERIOD

title: Broken water main closes State Capitol complex  | News | ocolly.com
